body: Many anal and Dp scenes + sport clubs. I love that combination. I like the retro style (some characters reminds me ranma), but there is some sex scenes that have anatomic issues (I not looking some ultra realistic artstyle or anything). The plot is nonsense: the girls should be cum dumpsters in order to increase their sport abilities. I cannot be hypocrite to criticize this, though, considering that I am addicted to hentai.
